journal.name: Rate your knowledge: What do you know about UDL?
journal.intro:
Tell us what you know about UDL. Add a journal entry (about 3 sentences) of your understanding of UDL and tell us if you consider yourself a...

  • UDL expert You apply the principles in your teaching every day;
  • UDL novice You consider the principles and are learning more about the framework;
  • UDL newbie The term UDL and its guidelines are still new to you.

Back
